alethinophidia.game

Class MenuGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.game.MenuGenerator

  • public class MenuGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Main control center of in game menus (except for InGameInterface). Creates and holds all the menu windows
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
